description:
Ubuntu’s long term support versions allow direct upgrade from one LTS to the other. This allows large organisation to limit how often they have to upgrade their desktop and servers.

This session will explain what to expect when upgrading for Ubuntu Server Edition 8.04LTS to 10.04LTS in terms of:

   • new features
   • process
   • caveats
title: Upgrading to Ubuntu Server Edition 10.04LTS
